sense.gloss: airplane, aeroplane, plane, aircraft
aviation, flight, flying
to fly, to take a flight
to fly, to soar
to jump, to leap, to spring, to bound, to hop
to spatter, to scatter, to splash, to fly (e.g. of sparks)
to hurry, to rush
to flee, to run off, to escape
to disappear, to vanish, to fade, to thin out
to break off, to come off, to fall off, to blow (of a fuse)
to be sent out (of an order), to fly (of false rumours, catcalls, etc.)
to come flying (of a punch, kick, etc.)
to be missing (of a page, stitch, etc.), to skip, to jump (e.g. of a conversation)
selling or divesting in unwanted stocks, hiding bad loans
leap, jump
stepping out into the wider world, becoming active on a wider stage, playing an active part (in)
rapid progress, dramatic development, making great strides, making a leap forward
leap (of logic), jump, gap (in an argument)
something that leaps or thrusts out
flying, leaping, flight, leap
zero, naught, oh
flying fish (esp. the Japanese flying fish, Cypselurus agoo)
running out of points (zero or fewer), game ending due to a player running out of points
flying without hindrance
rook
airfield, airport

sdata.j: ↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓が↑乱気流↑↓らんきりゅう↓に↑近付↑↓ちかづ↓いていたため↑操縦↑↓そうじゅう↓↑士↑↓し↓は↑乗客↑↓じょうきゃく↓にシートベルトを↑締↑↓し↓めるよう↑呼↑↓よ↓びかけた。
sdata.e: As the plane was approaching turbulence, the pilot asked the passengers aboard the plane to fasten their seat belts.

sdata.j: ↑国王↑↓こくおう↓はいつも↑自分↑↓じぶん↓を↑褒↑↓ほ↓めるおべっか↑使↑↓づか↓いにうんざりしていたので↑彼↑↓かれ↓らを↑遠↑↓とお↓くへ↑飛↑↓と↓ばした。
sdata.e: The king was tired of his sycophants always praising him, so he sent them away.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓で↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓したことがありますか。
sdata.e: Have you ever traveled in a plane?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑親元↑↓おやもと↓から↑飛↑↓と↓び↑出↑↓だ↓せるか。
sdata.e: Can you break away from your parents?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑空↑↓そら↓を↑飛↑↓と↓ぶ↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓を↑見↑↓み↓る↑事↑↓こと↓がありますか。
sdata.e: Do you ever dream about flying through the sky?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑運↑↓うん↓がよかった。↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓は↑定時↑↓ていじ↓↑運航↑↓うんこう↓だよ。
sdata.e: You're in luck. The plane is on time.

sdata.j: ↑空↑↓そら↓↑飛↑↓と↓ぶ↑円盤↑↓えんばん↓を↑見↑↓み↓た↑事↑↓こと↓がありますか。
sdata.e: Have you ever seen a UFO?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑行動↑↓こうどう↓は↑突飛↑↓とっぴ↓すぎるよ。
↑君↑↓きみ↓のために↑模型↑↓もけい↓↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓を↑作↑↓つく↓ってあげよう。
sdata.e: I'll make a model plane for you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓に↑模型↑↓もけい↓↑飛行機↑↓ひこうき↓を↑作↑↓つく↓ってあげよう。
sdata.e: I'll make you a model plane.
